name: Fury Fighter:Super
description:
Are you ready for the brand new hot-blooded fighting game? Fury Fighter: Return is released! Simple and concise manipulations, gorgeous and amazing special effects, awaken your memory of zeal! Build your dream team and travel through the universe, experiencing the great adventure together with players all over the world!

GAME FEATURES:
Fighters Recruiting & Cultivation
Various fighters can be collected and set team as you wish.
Skills enhancement, unlocking the stronger forms!
Strategic Combats with Combos
A variety of characters can be arranged strategically.
Click on the screen to trigger combos according to the combat rhythm, which provides a tensional and stimulating game experience.
New Adventure
Start your adventure, achieve powerful props through defeating enemies.
Explore the world of universe fighters.

Download Fury Fighter: Return right now! Join in the universe dogfight with the players all over the world!
